entry.title: Python rounding to 05
entry.summary: Here in Switzerland they decided (for some reason, that can't be good) not to pay the correct amount, but round it to the nearest 0/5 cent - which is a pain when doing python stuff. Therefore i made a Decimal rounding function for python, check it out: `` from decimal import Decimal, ROUND_HALF_UP def decimal_round(d, digits=0, to_five=True): if to_five: d = (d/Decimal("5")) d = d.quantize(Decimal("1") / (Decimal('10') ** digits), rounding=ROUND_HALF_UP) if to_five: d = d * Decimal("5") return d``
